snippet: In a video shown on ESPN, Rutgers basketball coach Mike Rice is seen yelling homophobic slurs at his players, kicking them, grabbing them, shoving them and throwing basketballs at them.
abstract: Rutgers men’s basketball coach Mike Rice is fined $50,000 and suspended for three games after video of him kicking, grabbing, shoving and yelling homophobic slurs at his players goes viral.
lead_paragraph: In a video shown on ESPN, Rutgers basketball coach Mike Rice is seen yelling homophobic slurs at his players, kicking them, grabbing them, shoving them and throwing basketballs at them.

headline.seo: Rutgers Coach Mike Rice Facing Scrutiny After Video Airs
headline.main: Video Puts Rutgers Coach Under Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: Video Puts Rutgers Coach Under Scrutiny

keywords.value: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
